mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.cheliang_id as cheliangId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.paizhaozuanyi_name as paizhaozuanyiName ,a.paizhaozuanyi_paizhao as paizhaozuanyiPaizhao ,a.paizhaozuanyi_yesno_types as paizhaozuanyiYesnoTypes ,a.paizhaozuanyi_yesno_text as paizhaozuanyiYesnoText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,cheliang.cheliang_name as cheliangName ,cheliang.cheliang_types as cheliangTypes ,cheliang.cheliang_paizhao as cheliangPaizhao ,cheliang.paizhao_types as paizhaoTypes ,cheliang.yonghu_id as cheliangYonghuId ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM paizhaozuanyi a left JOIN cheliang cheliang ON a.cheliang_id = cheliang.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.cheliang_id = #{params.cheliangId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} or cheliang.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.paizhaozuanyi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.paizhaozuanyiName},'%')
and a.paizhaozuanyi_paizhao like CONCAT('%',#{params.paizhaozuanyiPaizhao},'%')
and a.paizhaozuanyi_yesno_types = #{params.paizhaozuanyiYesnoTypes}
and a.paizhaozuanyi_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.paizhaozuanyiYesnoText},'%')
and a.cheliang_id IS NOT NULL
and cheliang.cheliang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangName},'%')
and cheliang.cheliang_types = #{params.cheliangTypes}
and cheliang.cheliang_paizhao like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangPaizhao},'%')
and cheliang.paizhao_types = #{params.paizhaoTypes}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
